titleStmt.title: A sixe-folde politician Together with a sixe-folde precept of policy.
titleStmt.author: Melton, John, Sir, d. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[dward] A[llde] for Iohn Busby, and are to be solde at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: I.M., i.e. Sir John Melton.
Erroneously attributed to John Milton (1563-1647), the poet's father.
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard
